WRITING.TEXT:
That's a good source because they have no political lean in one direction or the other and are therefore completely unbiased
The same can be said for those on the climate change alarmism side.
You are missing the point. He's not condemning others for doing exactly what he's doing.

WRITING.TITLE: Hacker remotely crashes Jeep from 10 miles away
Hacker remotely crashes Jeep from 10 miles away

WRITING.TEXT:
Changing our behaviors out of fear isn't a good thing
Except for Man-made Global Warming, right?
